Silver, Gold and Platinum members get bonus points in addition to the points they earn when they use a Macy`s Card, and Bronze members get bonus points in addition to the points they earn, less discounts and adjustments on qualifying purchases at Macy`s and macys.com. Bonus points are not earned: on furniture, rugs, mattresses, tech, Barnes & Noble, Finish Line, Sunglass Hut, Lids, Louis Vuitton, Chow Tai Fook 24K gold, Pandora, Macy`s Gift Cards, services (e.g., Beauty Box and other subscription services, restaurants, salon services, alterations, etc.), fees, or sales tax; at Macy`s Backstage or the Gucci Shop at Macy`s Herald Square; on purchases made outside of Macy`s or in any department that does not use a Macy`s point of sale register; or when redeeming Star Money rewards or Macy`s Gift Cards. Every time 1,000 points are accumulated, a $10 Star Money reward will be issued. Star Money rewards may be used to purchase merchandise at Macy`s but can`t be exchanged for cash or used: to purchase Macy`s Gift Cards; for services (e.g., Beauty Box and other subscription services, restaurants, salon services, alterations, etc.); in any department that doesn`t use a Macy`s point of sale register; for any purchase that will be shipped outside the U.S.; or as payment on any credit account. To redeem a Star Money reward on orders of furniture and mattresses on macys.com, you must call Macy`s Customer Service. It may not be redeemed if you use a virtual wallet or self-checkout. Each Star Money reward is valid for 30 calendar days from issuance. Additional terms and conditions apply; see a Store Colleague or macys.com/starrewards for complete program Privacy\u003C/h4>\u003Cp id=\"ot-pc-desc\" class=\"ot-grp-desc\">When you visit our website, we store cookies on your browser to collect information. The information collected might relate to you, your preferences or your device, and is mostly used to make the site work as you expect it to and to provide a more personalized web experience. However, you can choose not to allow certain types of cookies, which may impact your experience of the site and the services we are able to offer. Click on the different category headings to find out more and change our default settings according to your preference.\n                \u003Cbr>\u003Ca href=\"https://customerservice-macys.com/articles/macys-and-macyscom-notice-of-privacy-practices#Cookies\" class=\"privacy-notice-link\" rel=\"noopener\" target=\"_blank\" aria-label=\"More information about your privacy, opens in a new tab\">More information\u003C/a>\u003C/p>\u003C/div>\u003Cdiv class=\"ot-desc-cntr ot-hide ot-always-active-group\" role=\"tabpanel\" tabindex=\"0\" id=\"ot-desc-id-C0001\">\u003Cdiv class=\"ot-grp-hdr1\">\u003Ch4 class=\"ot-cat-header\">Strictly Necessary Cookies\u003C/h4>\u003Cdiv class=\"ot-tgl-cntr\">\u003Cdiv class=\"ot-always-active\">Always Active\u003C/div>\u003C/div>\u003C/div>\u003Cp class=\"ot-grp-desc ot-category-desc\">These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms. You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site will not then work. These cookies do not store any personal information.\u003C/p>\u003C/div>\u003Cdiv class=\"ot-desc-cntr ot-hide ot-always-active-group\" role=\"tabpanel\" tabindex=\"0\" id=\"ot-desc-id-C0003\">\u003Cdiv class=\"ot-grp-hdr1\">\u003Ch4 class=\"ot-cat-header\">Functional Cookies\u003C/h4>\u003Cdiv class=\"ot-tgl-cntr\">\u003Cdiv class=\"ot-always-active\">Always Active\u003C/div>\u003C/div>\u003C/div>\u003Cp class=\"ot-grp-desc ot-category-desc\">These cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalization. They may be set by us or by third party providers whose services we have added to our pages.You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but then some or all of these services may not function properly.\u003C/p>\u003C/div>\u003Cdiv class=\"ot-desc-cntr ot-hide ot-always-active-group\" role=\"tabpanel\" tabindex=\"0\" id=\"ot-desc-id-C0002\">\u003Cdiv class=\"ot-grp-hdr1\">\u003Ch4 class=\"ot-cat-header\">Performance Cookies\u003C/h4>\u003Cdiv class=\"ot-tgl-cntr\">\u003Cdiv class=\"ot-always-active\">Always Active\u003C/div>\u003C/div>\u003C/div>\u003Cp class=\"ot-grp-desc ot-category-desc\">These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us to know which pages are the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site. All information these cookies collect is aggregated and therefore anonymous.You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but then we will not know when you have visited our site, and will not be able to monitor its performance.\u003C/p>\u003C/div>\u003Cdiv class=\"ot-desc-cntr ot-hide\" role=\"tabpanel\" tabindex=\"0\" id=\"ot-desc-id-SPD_BG\">\u003Cdiv class=\"ot-grp-hdr1\">\u003Ch4 class=\"ot-cat-header\">Sale of Personal Information\u003C/h4>\u003Cdiv class=\"ot-tgl\">\u003Cinput type=\"checkbox\" name=\"ot-group-id-SPD_BG\" id=\"ot-group-id-SPD_BG\" aria-checked=\"true\" role=\"switch\" class=\"category-switch-handler\" data-optanongroupid=\"SPD_BG\" checked=\"\" aria-labelledby=\"ot-header-id-SPD_BG\"> \u003Clabel class=\"ot-switch\" for=\"ot-group-id-SPD_BG\">\u003Cspan class=\"ot-switch-nob\">\u003C/span> \u003Cspan class=\"ot-label-txt\">Sale of Personal Information\u003C/span>\u003C/label> \u003C/div>\u003Cdiv class=\"ot-tgl-cntr\">\u003C/div>\u003C/div>\u003Cp class=\"ot-grp-desc ot-category-desc\">These cookies collect information for analytics and to personalize your experience with targeted ads. Online purchases must be made by 11:59pm EST on offer end date to earn bonus points. Silver, Gold and Platinum members get bonus points in addition to the points they earn when they use a Macy`s Card, and Bronze members get bonus points in addition to the points they earn, less discounts and adjustments on qualifying purchases at Macy`s and macys.com. Members can earn a maximum of 500,000 points ($5,000 in Star Money) per item on jewelry trunk show purchases. You must check out as a Star Rewards member in order to earn points. Star Rewards members who present a Macy`s Card at point of sale but choose to pay with a different form of tender, including payment with a Macy`s Card in a virtual wallet, will earn bonus points at the Bronze status rate. Silver, Gold and Platinum members who do not pay with their Macy`s Card on macys.com, including payment with a Macy`s Card in a virtual wallet, will not earn bonus points on that purchase. Bonus points are not earned: on furniture, rugs, mattresses, tech, Barnes & Noble, Finish Line, Sunglass Hut, Lids, Louis Vuitton, Chow Tai Fook 24K gold, Pandora, Macy`s Gift Cards, services (e.g., Beauty Box and other subscription services, restaurants, salon services, alterations, etc.), fees, or sales tax; at Macy`s Backstage or the Gucci Shop at Macy`s Herald Square; on purchases made outside of Macy`s or in any department that does not use a Macy`s point of sale register; or when redeeming Star Money rewards or Macy`s Gift Cards. Every time 1,000 points are accumulated, a $10 Star Money reward will be issued. Star Money rewards may be used to purchase merchandise at Macy`s but can`t be exchanged for cash or used: to purchase Macy`s Gift Cards; for services (e.g., Beauty Box and other subscription services, restaurants, salon services, alterations, etc.); in any department that doesn`t use a Macy`s point of sale register; for any purchase that will be shipped outside the U.S.; or as payment on any credit account. To redeem a Star Money reward on orders of furniture and mattresses on macys.com, you must call Macy`s Customer Service. It may not be redeemed if you use a virtual wallet or self-checkout. Each Star Money reward is valid for 30 calendar days from issuance. Silver, Gold and Platinum members get bonus points in addition to the points they earn when they use a Macy`s Card, and Bronze members get bonus points in addition to the points they earn, less discounts and adjustments on qualifying purchases at Macy`s and macys.com. Privacy\u003C/h4>\u003Cp id=\"ot-pc-desc\" class=\"ot-grp-desc\">When you visit our website, we store cookies on your browser to collect information. The information collected might relate to you, your preferences or your device, and is mostly used to make the site work as you expect it to and to provide a more personalized web experience. However, you can choose not to allow certain types of cookies, which may impact your experience of the site and the services we are able to offer. Click on the different category headings to find out more and change our default settings according to your preference.\n                \u003Cbr>\u003Ca href=\"https://customerservice-macys.com/articles/macys-and-macyscom-notice-of-privacy-practices#Cookies\" class=\"privacy-notice-link\" rel=\"noopener\" target=\"_blank\" aria-label=\"More information about your privacy, opens in a new tab\">More information\u003C/a>\u003C/p>\u003C/div>\u003Cdiv class=\"ot-desc-cntr ot-hide ot-always-active-group\" role=\"tabpanel\" tabindex=\"0\" id=\"ot-desc-id-C0001\">\u003Cdiv class=\"ot-grp-hdr1\">\u003Ch4 class=\"ot-cat-header\">Strictly Necessary Cookies\u003C/h4>\u003Cdiv class=\"ot-tgl-cntr\">\u003Cdiv class=\"ot-always-active\">Always Active\u003C/div>\u003C/div>\u003C/div>\u003Cp class=\"ot-grp-desc ot-category-desc\">These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms. You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site will not then work. These cookies do not store any personal information.\u003C/p>\u003C/div>\u003Cdiv class=\"ot-desc-cntr ot-hide ot-always-active-group\" role=\"tabpanel\" tabindex=\"0\" id=\"ot-desc-id-C0003\">\u003Cdiv class=\"ot-grp-hdr1\">\u003Ch4 class=\"ot-cat-header\">Functional Cookies\u003C/h4>\u003Cdiv class=\"ot-tgl-cntr\">\u003Cdiv class=\"ot-always-active\">Always Active\u003C/div>\u003C/div>\u003C/div>\u003Cp class=\"ot-grp-desc ot-category-desc\">These cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalization. They may be set by us or by third party providers whose services we have added to our pages.You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but then some or all of these services may not function properly.\u003C/p>\u003C/div>\u003Cdiv class=\"ot-desc-cntr ot-hide ot-always-active-group\" role=\"tabpanel\" tabindex=\"0\" id=\"ot-desc-id-C0002\">\u003Cdiv class=\"ot-grp-hdr1\">\u003Ch4 class=\"ot-cat-header\">Performance Cookies\u003C/h4>\u003Cdiv class=\"ot-tgl-cntr\">\u003Cdiv class=\"ot-always-active\">Always Active\u003C/div>\u003C/div>\u003C/div>\u003Cp class=\"ot-grp-desc ot-category-desc\">These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us to know which pages are the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site. All information these cookies collect is aggregated and therefore anonymous.You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but then we will not know when you have visited our site, and will not be able to monitor its performance.\u003C/p>\u003C/div>\u003Cdiv class=\"ot-desc-cntr ot-hide\" role=\"tabpanel\" tabindex=\"0\" id=\"ot-desc-id-SPD_BG\">\u003Cdiv class=\"ot-grp-hdr1\">\u003Ch4 class=\"ot-cat-header\">Sale of Personal Information\u003C/h4>\u003Cdiv class=\"ot-tgl\">\u003Cinput type=\"checkbox\" name=\"ot-group-id-SPD_BG\" id=\"ot-group-id-SPD_BG\" aria-checked=\"true\" role=\"switch\" class=\"category-switch-handler\" data-optanongroupid=\"SPD_BG\" checked=\"\" aria-labelledby=\"ot-header-id-SPD_BG\"> \u003Clabel class=\"ot-switch\" for=\"ot-group-id-SPD_BG\">\u003Cspan class=\"ot-switch-nob\">\u003C/span> \u003Cspan class=\"ot-label-txt\">Sale of Personal Information\u003C/span>\u003C/label> \u003C/div>\u003Cdiv class=\"ot-tgl-cntr\">\u003C/div>\u003C/div>\u003Cp class=\"ot-grp-desc ot-category-desc\">These cookies collect information for analytics and to personalize your experience with targeted ads. Silver, Gold and Platinum members get bonus points in addition to the points they earn when they use a Macy`s Card, and Bronze members get bonus points in addition to the points they earn, less discounts and adjustments on qualifying purchases at Macy`s and macys.com. Members can earn a maximum of 500,000 points ($5,000 in Star Money) per item on jewelry trunk show purchases. You must check out as a Star Rewards member in order to earn points. Star Rewards members who present a Macy`s Card at point of sale but choose to pay with a different form of tender, including payment with a Macy`s Card in a virtual wallet, will earn bonus points at the Bronze status rate. Silver, Gold and Platinum members who do not pay with their Macy`s Card on macys.com, including payment with a Macy`s Card in a virtual wallet, will not earn bonus points on that purchase. Online purchases must be made by 11:59pm EST on offer end date to earn bonus points. Silver, Gold and Platinum members get bonus points in addition to the points they earn when they use a Macy`s Card, and Bronze members get bonus points in addition to the points they earn, less discounts and adjustments on qualifying purchases at Macy`s and macys.com. Members can earn a maximum of 500,000 points ($5,000 in Star Money) per item on jewelry trunk show purchases. You must check out as a Star Rewards member in order to earn points. Star Rewards members who present a Macy`s Card at point of sale but choose to pay with a different form of tender, including payment with a Macy`s Card in a virtual wallet, will earn bonus points at the Bronze status rate. Silver, Gold and Platinum members who do not pay with their Macy`s Card on macys.com, including payment with a Macy`s Card in a virtual wallet, will not earn bonus points on that purchase. Bonus points are not earned: on furniture, rugs, mattresses, tech, Barnes & Noble, Finish Line, Sunglass Hut, Lids, Louis Vuitton, Chow Tai Fook 24K gold, Pandora, Macy`s Gift Cards, services (e.g., Beauty Box and other subscription services, restaurants, salon services, alterations, etc.), fees, or sales tax; at Macy`s Backstage or the Gucci Shop at Macy`s Herald Square; on purchases made outside of Macy`s or in any department that does not use a Macy`s point of sale register; or when redeeming Star Money rewards or Macy`s Gift Cards. Every time 1,000 points are accumulated, a $10 Star Money reward will be issued. Star Money rewards may be used to purchase merchandise at Macy`s but can`t be exchanged for cash or used: to purchase Macy`s Gift Cards; for services (e.g., Beauty Box and other subscription services, restaurants, salon services, alterations, etc.); in any department that doesn`t use a Macy`s point of sale register; for any purchase that will be shipped outside the U.S.; or as payment on any credit account. To redeem a Star Money reward on orders of furniture and mattresses on macys.com, you must call Macy`s Customer Service. It may not be redeemed if you use a virtual wallet or self-checkout. Each Star Money reward is valid for 30 calendar days from issuance. Privacy\u003C/h4>\u003Cp id=\"ot-pc-desc\" class=\"ot-grp-desc\">When you visit our website, we store cookies on your browser to collect information. The information collected might relate to you, your preferences or your device, and is mostly used to make the site work as you expect it to and to provide a more personalized web experience. However, you can choose not to allow certain types of cookies, which may impact your experience of the site and the services we are able to offer. Click on the different category headings to find out more and change our default settings according to your preference.\n                \u003Cbr>\u003Ca href=\"https://customerservice-macys.com/articles/macys-and-macyscom-notice-of-privacy-practices#Cookies\" class=\"privacy-notice-link\" rel=\"noopener\" target=\"_blank\" aria-label=\"More information about your privacy, opens in a new tab\">More information\u003C/a>\u003C/p>\u003C/div>\u003Cdiv class=\"ot-desc-cntr ot-hide ot-always-active-group\" role=\"tabpanel\" tabindex=\"0\" id=\"ot-desc-id-C0001\">\u003Cdiv class=\"ot-grp-hdr1\">\u003Ch4 class=\"ot-cat-header\">Strictly Necessary Cookies\u003C/h4>\u003Cdiv class=\"ot-tgl-cntr\">\u003Cdiv class=\"ot-always-active\">Always Active\u003C/div>\u003C/div>\u003C/div>\u003Cp class=\"ot-grp-desc ot-category-desc\">These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms. You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site will not then work. These cookies do not store any personal information.\u003C/p>\u003C/div>\u003Cdiv class=\"ot-desc-cntr ot-hide ot-always-active-group\" role=\"tabpanel\" tabindex=\"0\" id=\"ot-desc-id-C0003\">\u003Cdiv class=\"ot-grp-hdr1\">\u003Ch4 class=\"ot-cat-header\">Functional Cookies\u003C/h4>\u003Cdiv class=\"ot-tgl-cntr\">\u003Cdiv class=\"ot-always-active\">Always Active\u003C/div>\u003C/div>\u003C/div>\u003Cp class=\"ot-grp-desc ot-category-desc\">These cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalization. They may be set by us or by third party providers whose services we have added to our pages.You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but then some or all of these services may not function properly.\u003C/p>\u003C/div>\u003Cdiv class=\"ot-desc-cntr ot-hide ot-always-active-group\" role=\"tabpanel\" tabindex=\"0\" id=\"ot-desc-id-C0002\">\u003Cdiv class=\"ot-grp-hdr1\">\u003Ch4 class=\"ot-cat-header\">Performance Cookies\u003C/h4>\u003Cdiv class=\"ot-tgl-cntr\">\u003Cdiv class=\"ot-always-active\">Always Active\u003C/div>\u003C/div>\u003C/div>\u003Cp class=\"ot-grp-desc ot-category-desc\">These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us to know which pages are the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site. All information these cookies collect is aggregated and therefore anonymous.You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but then we will not know when you have visited our site, and will not be able to monitor its performance.\u003C/p>\u003C/div>\u003Cdiv class=\"ot-desc-cntr ot-hide\" role=\"tabpanel\" tabindex=\"0\" id=\"ot-desc-id-SPD_BG\">\u003Cdiv class=\"ot-grp-hdr1\">\u003Ch4 class=\"ot-cat-header\">Sale of Personal Information\u003C/h4>\u003Cdiv class=\"ot-tgl\">\u003Cinput type=\"checkbox\" name=\"ot-group-id-SPD_BG\" id=\"ot-group-id-SPD_BG\" aria-checked=\"true\" role=\"switch\" class=\"category-switch-handler\" data-optanongroupid=\"SPD_BG\" checked=\"\" aria-labelledby=\"ot-header-id-SPD_BG\"> \u003Clabel class=\"ot-switch\" for=\"ot-group-id-SPD_BG\">\u003Cspan class=\"ot-switch-nob\">\u003C/span> \u003Cspan class=\"ot-label-txt\">Sale of Personal Information\u003C/span>\u003C/label> \u003C/div>\u003Cdiv class=\"ot-tgl-cntr\">\u003C/div>\u003C/div>\u003Cp class=\"ot-grp-desc ot-category-desc\">These cookies collect information for analytics and to personalize your experience with targeted ads. Silver, Gold and Platinum members get bonus points in addition to the points they earn when they use a Macy`s Card, and Bronze members get bonus points in addition to the points they earn, less discounts and adjustments on qualifying purchases at Macy`s and macys.com. Bonus points are not earned: on furniture, rugs, mattresses, tech, Barnes & Noble, Finish Line, Sunglass Hut, Lids, Louis Vuitton, Chow Tai Fook 24K gold, Pandora, Macy`s Gift Cards, services (e.g., Beauty Box and other subscription services, restaurants, salon services, alterations, etc.), fees, or sales tax; at Macy`s Backstage or the Gucci Shop at Macy`s Herald Square; on purchases made outside of Macy`s or in any department that does not use a Macy`s point of sale register; or when redeeming Star Money rewards or Macy`s Gift Cards. Every time 1,000 points are accumulated, a $10 Star Money reward will be issued. Star Money rewards may be used to purchase merchandise at Macy`s but can`t be exchanged for cash or used: to purchase Macy`s Gift Cards; for services (e.g., Beauty Box and other subscription services, restaurants, salon services, alterations, etc.); in any department that doesn`t use a Macy`s point of sale register; for any purchase that will be shipped outside the U.S.; or as payment on any credit account. To redeem a Star Money reward on orders of furniture and mattresses on macys.com, you must call Macy`s Customer Service. It may not be redeemed if you use a virtual wallet or self-checkout. Each Star Money reward is valid for 30 calendar days from issuance. Additional terms and conditions apply; see a Store Colleague or macys.com/starrewards for complete program Privacy\u003C/h4>\u003Cp id=\"ot-pc-desc\" class=\"ot-grp-desc\">When you visit our website, we store cookies on your browser to collect information. The information collected might relate to you, your preferences or your device, and is mostly used to make the site work as you expect it to and to provide a more personalized web experience. However, you can choose not to allow certain types of cookies, which may impact your experience of the site and the services we are able to offer. Click on the different category headings to find out more and change our default settings according to your preference.\n                \u003Cbr>\u003Ca href=\"https://customerservice-macys.com/articles/macys-and-macyscom-notice-of-privacy-practices#Cookies\" class=\"privacy-notice-link\" rel=\"noopener\" target=\"_blank\" aria-label=\"More information about your privacy, opens in a new tab\">More information\u003C/a>\u003C/p>\u003C/div>\u003Cdiv class=\"ot-desc-cntr ot-hide ot-always-active-group\" role=\"tabpanel\" tabindex=\"0\" id=\"ot-desc-id-C0001\">\u003Cdiv class=\"ot-grp-hdr1\">\u003Ch4 class=\"ot-cat-header\">Strictly Necessary Cookies\u003C/h4>\u003Cdiv class=\"ot-tgl-cntr\">\u003Cdiv class=\"ot-always-active\">Always Active\u003C/div>\u003C/div>\u003C/div>\u003Cp class=\"ot-grp-desc ot-category-desc\">These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms. You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site will not then work. These cookies do not store any personal information.\u003C/p>\u003C/div>\u003Cdiv class=\"ot-desc-cntr ot-hide ot-always-active-group\" role=\"tabpanel\" tabindex=\"0\" id=\"ot-desc-id-C0003\">\u003Cdiv class=\"ot-grp-hdr1\">\u003Ch4 class=\"ot-cat-header\">Functional Cookies\u003C/h4>\u003Cdiv class=\"ot-tgl-cntr\">\u003Cdiv class=\"ot-always-active\">Always Active\u003C/div>\u003C/div>\u003C/div>\u003Cp class=\"ot-grp-desc ot-category-desc\">These cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalization. They may be set by us or by third party providers whose services we have added to our pages.You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but then some or all of these services may not function properly.\u003C/p>\u003C/div>\u003Cdiv class=\"ot-desc-cntr ot-hide ot-always-active-group\" role=\"tabpanel\" tabindex=\"0\" id=\"ot-desc-id-C0002\">\u003Cdiv class=\"ot-grp-hdr1\">\u003Ch4 class=\"ot-cat-header\">Performance Cookies\u003C/h4>\u003Cdiv class=\"ot-tgl-cntr\">\u003Cdiv class=\"ot-always-active\">Always Active\u003C/div>\u003C/div>\u003C/div>\u003Cp class=\"ot-grp-desc ot-category-desc\">These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us to know which pages are the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site. All information these cookies collect is aggregated and therefore anonymous.You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but then we will not know when you have visited our site, and will not be able to monitor its performance.\u003C/p>\u003C/div>\u003Cdiv class=\"ot-desc-cntr ot-hide\" role=\"tabpanel\" tabindex=\"0\" id=\"ot-desc-id-SPD_BG\">\u003Cdiv class=\"ot-grp-hdr1\">\u003Ch4 class=\"ot-cat-header\">Sale of Personal Information\u003C/h4>\u003Cdiv class=\"ot-tgl\">\u003Cinput type=\"checkbox\" name=\"ot-group-id-SPD_BG\" id=\"ot-group-id-SPD_BG\" aria-checked=\"true\" role=\"switch\" class=\"category-switch-handler\" data-optanongroupid=\"SPD_BG\" checked=\"\" aria-labelledby=\"ot-header-id-SPD_BG\"> \u003Clabel class=\"ot-switch\" for=\"ot-group-id-SPD_BG\">\u003Cspan class=\"ot-switch-nob\">\u003C/span> \u003Cspan class=\"ot-label-txt\">Sale of Personal Information\u003C/span>\u003C/label> \u003C/div>\u003Cdiv class=\"ot-tgl-cntr\">\u003C/div>\u003C/div>\u003Cp class=\"ot-grp-desc ot-category-desc\">These cookies collect information for analytics and to personalize your experience with targeted ads.
